title: Womens Dress
title_original: Chanyarn Women's Turtleneck 100% Merino Wool 2025 First-Line Ready to Wear Fall Winter Seamless Knit Pullover Sweater

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #48,242 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #639 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, well-made, and comfortable, with one noting it's not too heavy or itchy. They appreciate its appearance, describing it as expensive-looking, and like its color. The turtleneck is not too tight, and the fabric feels like cashmere. Opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs very small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding value
items.body: This is the perfect sweater if you'd like to add an additional color to your wardrobe at a very reasonable price. The fabric is super, super soft and thick, but not too thick. I'm a size 12 and the Karge was fitted. I'd go XL if I wanted any looseness. It's on the shorter side but not cropped. Really perfect length. The sleeves are a bit short on me but it's not bad. I like that my watch shows. The only downsides are that I've worn it several times and have noticed the tiniest bit of pilling. Also, there's no tag so I'm not entirely sure I'm wearing it with the front or back. Anyway, so minor, I'll probably get this is an additional color. Great value. Read more
items.author: AVB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeouscashmere blend turtleneck sweater.
items.body: Beautiful high-and cashmere blend turtleneck sweater. Rich deep black color. True to size. Beautiful detailed work for seams. Turtleneck is not too tight in the neck to gently fold it down or leave upright. I got a size small and it’s plenty roomy for me. I’m a 34 D, 122 pounds . It’s really beautiful and very comfortable and soft to wear.! Read more
items.author: Kelly’s closet

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still beautiful after a year's wearing
items.body: I bought this a year ago. Soft and warm, and still in good shape after many, many wearings. Read more
items.author: Woodhathhope

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lovely sweater. Runs small.
items.body: The yarn is beautiful. The sweater is soft and appears well-made. But it runs very small. Typically I wear a U.S. large (12-14), so I got x-large. The x-large is tight and it would be embarrassing to be seen in this - it's more like a U.S. medium. Read more
items.author: P. Radloff

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like it
items.body: looks and feels great. perfect fit for 5'1" 105 lb small chested woman. will see if it pills. hope not. Read more
items.author: Elle Appel

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very warm, nice to the touch cashmere like feeling.
items.body: Bought size Medium, Karamel color. Size label is sewn in the seam inside, on the left side. Very soft pleasant to the touch, cashmere like feeling, has some "body" meaning is a little thickness, it is not thin. I've worn it a few times under the jacket. It is a little snug on my Petite 5.2, 130lb frame. I would order Large next time. After wearing it, I noticed a little of piling at front. I took 1 star off because of that. I will still order one more. You can't get anything similar for this price. Read more
items.author: Grace Z.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Advertising is misleading
items.body: Customers should know that this product is not cashmere. It is hundred percent Marino wool. Cashmere yarns were not used in the making of this sweater. It’s fraudulent advertising. I will no longer buy any product from this company. Read more
items.author: Sandra Diane Lee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very warm
items.body: It is very soft. Fits well. True to size Read more
items.author: shelly olliff

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Brown, Khaki, Pink, Beige, Star Blue, Black, Caramel, Navy Blue, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
